EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis - APAC - 2014.02.1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Join us for our newest webinar, Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis, where Anil Kumar Singh of Wipro and Thomas Hadorn of Tricentis team up to share an insider’s perspective on effectively implementing new software into your business environment. Learn how Wipro has implemented enterprise-wide solutions using Tricentis Tosca Testsuite to deliver value by:
- Minimizing defects in applications - Dramatically decreasing time-to-market - Improving agility in business operations - Significantly reducing the number of test cases
Our “Business Assurance for SAP with Wipro and Tricentis” webinar will take place on February 12th, 2015, starting at 1:00 p.m. AEST.
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-business-assurance-for-sap-apac.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-business-assurance-for-sap-apac.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Thu, Feb 12, 2015 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. AEST 11:00 a.m. – 12:00 p.m. AWST/SGT 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. NZST
Thomas Hadorn Managing Director Asia-Pacific Tricentis
Anil Kumar Singh Head, SAP Testing Practice Wipro
